casebody.data:
William QUICK, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Glenn KRAMER, Defendant. M-873/874 September Term 2017
080058 Supreme Court of New Jersey. June 15, 2018

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion of the Home Service Store, Inc. for leave to participate in oral argument (M-874) is denied; and it is further

ORDERED that the motion for leave to appeal (M-873) is granted and the matter is summarily remanded to the trial court for reconsideration in light of Spade v. Select Comfort Corp. , ___ N.J. ___ (2018). Jurisdiction is not retained.
